content.rendered:
Madrigals live hidden in the mountains of Colombia. Their magical home is located in the bustling town of Encanto, full of wonder and charm. Encanto’s magic has blessed each child in the family with individual talents, from superhuman strength to healing powers—every child except for one, Mirabel. But when Mirabel discovers that Encanto’s magic is in danger, she feels that she, the average Madrigal, may be the only hope for her exceptional family.

Directors: Jared Bush. Byron Howard. Charise Castro Smith

Written By Charise Castro Smith. Jared Bush. Byron Howard

Stars: Stephanie Beatriz. María Cecilia Botero. John Leguizamo
